function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in reporting infectious disease cases due to intermediary processes","Impact":"Difficulty in responding promptly to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Use of blockchain for automatic and immediate reporting","Technologies":"Blockchain technology","People":"Healthcare professionals, public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Passive reporting method leading to omission of reports","Impact":"Inaccurate data on infectious disease cases, hindered response efforts","Mitigation":"Implementation of an active reporting system with blockchain technology","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, real-time reporting systems","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of hacking attack on central server for infectious disease reporting system","Impact":"Manipulation of data, compromised transparency and accuracy of outbreak circumstances","Mitigation":"Use of blockchain for secure and transparent data storage","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, secure data encryption","People":"Public health authorities, general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, technology companies"}]}
